so i pretty much love Paige.
the end.
:]

<center>SUICIDE

me, myself, and suicide

suicide is a mysterious thing
you'll never no the pain it brings

to the one u love or the ones who loved you

sometimes i wonder,
wonder if he'll care
or if he'll move on like a ride at the fair

please take me away!
away forever...
i want to die, i have no reason to love

maybe if he loved me,
but he dont,
so take the blud i shed
and cherish it forever
and remember me as the girl whoonce loved you


By, Patricia



**inspired by <u>Teddy</u>

<center>BROKEN

my heart
plus
its cuts
plus
the blud
plus
the tears

equals

my broken heart
the heart you broke
just tell me why
why would you do it
thats my one and only question
i dont want your love anymore
i want and answer
and...
just to be your friend


By, Patricia


**inspired by <u>Kizzle Wizzle</u>

<center>WISH

i wish i new
just what to do
about this love i have for you
so now i know this cant be
so im gonna watch her plea plea plea

i know that u never loved me
especially when u hugged me

your hugs werent sincere
they were fake
so wont you come here
and make this sincere

i love you so mucj
all i want is to be loved in return
now i shall burn,
burn in hell
this is where i fell

i love you and goodbye


By, Patricia


**inspired by <u>Kizzle Wizzle</u>

<center>ITS TIME

lets have a ball
you make me stall
i wish you knew
its time you do
can i love you?
tell me whats true
is it me?
or, is it you?
i just cant help
dont you forget it,
i fucking hate you
u no this aint true
is it me or is it you?
i think its time,
time you knew
you knew that...
i think i LOVE you


By, Patricia


**inspired by <u>Mr. Teddy Bear</u>

<center>NEVER FELL 4 YOU

never!
nevr in my life did i think i'd fall for you
but you know what theres nothing that i can do

its not my fault
all i did was follow my broken heart
it led me to you
so, this is what im gunna do,

first ill go on like nothings different
second ill start acting weird
third ill ill write to you
fourth you will know
and fifth things will be weird and we wont talk anymore

five simple steps leading to you
and proving you the one
but now your gone...
so this could never happen

so just forget me and that i ever existed
but always remember that i loved you

more than you know


By, Patricia


**inspired by <u>Brandon</u>

<center>LOVE HURTS

love hurts real bad
it makes ,e really really sad

now the fact that he is gone
i had time to write a song

i loved him so much
but, he never knew
gee i'm soo blue
without you in my life
i dont know what to do,

your gone forever
yur dead, your dead
and i really miss you

please LORD just help me get through
thanx again, thank <u>YOU</u>



By, Patricia



**inspired by <u>Brandon</u>

i hate my life i feel soooo unloved...im so sad....like iono i dont rele no how i feel and if i wanna live or if i wanna die...it rele depends oh how i get treated by all the people that use me or all the people who hate me for no reason....well iono i just rele wanna die...wouldnt u if u werent loved?

okay wow i dont know where to start, umm...today i was at church and my phone vibrated saying i had a text from an unknown #...and i was all uh ok so i looked at it and it said thet my x-boyfriend was dead and that he had shot himslef 4 times in the head and then he died...his mom text me and i dont know wut to do, i have enough suicidal friends...

yay i think im finally over...him...yay i havent talked to him for the longest time and i am soooo happy! ya he has been weird lately but iono apparently now that im over him he like me and it kinda sux...but ya whatever...so yeah anyway i am so glad i am finally over...him..especially after all the shit me and him have been through together so liek iono i guess im just so happy now...i always say love rele sux and i still stand by that but yea im over him...but the only sad thing about this situation is the fact that now i kinda hate him and i dont want to...i convinced myself that i hated him and just yea i dont want to...me and him have gone through so much...im sick of being in love...love is a illness and i just got over it..im no longer sick and for that i am happy! i honestly just yea iono wut i am saying...all my depression is gone! well not all of it...most of it though...he still calls me but rarely and yea iono...he is so weird...but o so very very hot! lol anyway i dont like him anymore so yea! but i hope me and him can still be good friend...maybe with some benifits...lol...just kidding i dont want any...but yes i will always love him but it has changed to a different kind of love!

♥ ♥ ♥

<center>omg today was so much flippin fun! liek honestly it was so fun...who spends 1 hour sitting in del taco? well obviously me, tommy, and jessica...lol it was so much fun and o so very very random i wish i had a pic of the belt we made but i dont...we made a belt outa hot saucwe and duck tape...lol...so much fun! lol

e-mo-tion-al
emotional emotion is a funni thing especially the things it brings but when it stabs u in the back you almost have a heart attach but when u one u love is "he" it makes u wana cry then plea love is just a funni thing but you'll never no wut it can bring emotional love makes u very emo sometimes u wanna play keno but then u gamble away all your money then u laugh but it aint funni the one that loves u is by ur side but the one u love just hitched a ride "he" dont love u babe so "he" just gave u wanna die and "he" dont care so u go and buy yourself a teddy bear which should have been from "him" but God forbid it be a sin emotional emotion = love so love the one who loves u bak not the one who gave u this heart attach

ok jesscia dared me to not do my hair so like it was altotally frizzed out at church so it was like rele funni...but ya it was a very random night o ya and i had random post it notes all over my back haha funn!!!!

haha okay tonight at church was sooo random! we had like a fear factor thingy and like we had to eat random things for money...so like the first thing was like rele hootttttttt peppers and so like johnny tried it...it took him 10 minuites to eat 1 and a half and then he quite then kasey tried and it took him about 20 minuites to eat 5 then he quite but the whole time i wanted to go so at the end they let me have the rest so i had to beat the boys so i scarfed 7 in 2 minuites!! heck yes for me....an di got no money..they did!!!!

ok and earlier while they were eating peppers other people were eatig other stuff so like ya me and jessica wanted to go so we were like we will eat anything just for a dolatr so they brought out this pickle with strawberry and chocolate syrup on it and we eat had to eat one...but the thing is it looked gross and smelled gross but it wasnt that bad haha but it made me sick but it still wasnt horribl haha well ya church is funn!!!!! wel ya thats all i have to say! see ya!

<center>OMG bowling last night was soooooooooo much fun! i luved it! and like ya it was so awesome and i did really bad it was funny casue jasmine was like bowling for like 3 or 4 people! ya we hadbumpers! so much fun!

hey guess what?! okay i was readin this thing that says how to piss off your parents and shit...but after i read it i thought it shuld be called how to make your parents think youve lost your mind...so anywho! hehe funny word...okay anywayz it said to: climb the sidewalk, boil ice cream, and take your couch for a walk...sum pretty random shit...anyway dont boil ice cream its not a good idea..i tried it and its not smart...thats probly why i did it cause im dumb enough to try it! hehe woa it like kinda raining outside i love the rain...hehe rain is flippin awesome! oo yea yesterday at church my friend paul wore a trash bag as a skirt it was so funny! hehe i just a lil hyper...hehe anywayz lala i guess thats all i have to say...buh byez homiez!

okay i was at my friend auris house all weekend and e went to this gay party with her mom and her moms bf...so anyway we were there having a shitty time and we wanted to leave but they didnt want to..so we like finally start having fun...then like 10 minuites later they come and say lets gp! it really pissed us off! but ya anyway we got home and travis(the boyfriend) goes upstairs to bed! so then her mom was like im tired and she wanted to go to bed 2 so we made her stay up and then like 10 minuites till 12 me and auri fall asleep...it was so funny! cause it pissed her off!...but like anyway she woke us up and we had funthe whole weekend and we went shopping and shit but..anyway i had so much fun up in riverside!

okay im in this crisis i like two different people but like one i talk tomore but the other one i see more so im like a lil confused! i have no idea wut to do! grr.... well anyway im so happy!! tomorrows napolean dynamite night @ my church!!! ya heck yes im so excited and its gonna be hecka fun!! heck yes im so famn happy cept the whole 2 guys thing! well anyway im so bored!...lala oo yeah my two cousins got me the ciera CD goodies heck yes! oo and today me, jessica, and joey (my cousin) went to the mall and we met up with julia amd her friend named nikki and anyway we had so much fun we all got dared to run around with a thong on the outside of our pants so we did and it was funny...then we put boxers on outside of our pants and the lady got mad so whatever...and then we left and we were dressing up my cousin joey in girly clothes and really cheap and ghetto tacky outfits from ross and shit and it was so fuckin fun and earlier i went and bought stuff for napolean night!!! heck yes im so excited! wel anyway dinner is here so i have to go sit with the family unfortunately...

wow tonight was so flippin fun i went to church like @ iono 5 and @ 5:30 i went home and shit and then i went back @ 7 and i went and sat with paul and katrina and it was the candle light service and it was like really fun and after that ronnies dad drove me her and becky to dennys and we met tommy there and we all hung out @ dennys it was ronnie and tommy sittin next to each other and it was me and becky on the other side! and we ordered two orders of cheese stix and 1 oreder of fre4nch fries an 34 drinks and 2 oreo sundays!!!! it was the most unhealthy dinner i have ever eaten! but who cares it was so yummy and so much fun!!! it like our tradition now yay!!! well yeah it was so much fun!!!

wow okay me and jessica were @ my house chillin and she like got a call form OMG josh! (her bf) and he wanted us to come to the orange mall (the village of orange) wich was weird 'cause he lives like a gajillion years away and ya...so anyway we walked down there and i was like tall retard and it was josh...well we were chillin and he gave us a ride to her house and we went to get out and shes like "i dunno how to open the door..." and so he opened it for her and her retarded self. so after she was out he was like "typical boyfriend having to ope the door for his girlfriend" so it was really funny!!!

omg okay on halloween i went to the mall with my friend nicci and jared. we were all dressed up and someone im not saying his name but he was smoking like an idiot! so later on he was still smoking but we had to meet up with katie kelly and her, her 3 friends plus her brother who is really old now but anyway her boyfriend also came too and his friend. but katies mom flipped out whn she saw youknow who smoing so she fuckin called the police and left him the in the middle of nowhere and so he had to run home. it was so stupid that she called the police on him. well anyway it was so fun going trick or treating and i gots tons of candy! so it turned out all good except that one chick accidentally riped my skirt right down the middle. so i had to walk around holding my skirt up it was soooooooooo funny but it also sucked. i was so pissed aout that. well anyway in the end it was all good. so ya. oo ya we never figured out what happened to you know who so for all we know he could be dead so anyway thats what happened on halloween!

Ther is this really hot guy named Rex but me and my friends all think he is really GAY  lol ya we all have gaydar just kidding hes not gay but..ya...umm... anyway so he was walking by and he was talking to this guy i think it was lie walker or sumone and my friend was standing there and he said "like Oh My God" and she was like okay whatever and he turned around and said so im gay and she has a phsyco patch on her backpack and he said so is your name physco and she was like ya so now he thinks her name is phsyco!
